name: Almighty Companion
simple_desc: Every time a certain amount of Energy is regenerated by all allies, Mem gains Charge.
desc: Memosprite Mem has an initial SPD of #1[i] and Max HP equal to #2[i]% of Trailblazer's Max HP plus #4[i]. For every #3[i] Energy regenerated by all allies in total, Mem gains 1% Charge.
